title: What is this weird lag glitch thing with new client?

embed.description: this is for riot or other people who are having the same problem.

body: that's just one of the video's i recorded of it. It has been happening for a week or so now. I check my internet every time it happens and its fine. What usually happens is whenever i launch new client first time every day(does not happen with old client) or even i previously launched the old client. I have had ping of actual 1000's or higher b4 and that is not as bad as this.

replies.body:
Thanks for providing a video! It looks like you're experiencing bursts of *Packet Loss*, which explains why you're seeing little bursts of things falling out of sync and catching up. This may be caused by certain routing issues along your path to the servers, but we'll need to ensure your local settings are fine before we investigate further. To do this, I suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your network settings for League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not.
